Text:
YEAAAS! Was searching for this about 2 months back, can seem to find it anywhere. The one place i did manage to find it, the quality was terrible. I don't just mean low quality, i mean crap.
Cheers for this!
Youre welcome....it is kinda getting hard to find, I agree. Great album...enjoy! Thanks for seeding it too!
Classic hip hop! Too bad DOC lost his voice. Thanks for this!
youre welcome....it is too bad. This was his only album that was any good.
All the tracks have different bitrates and track 2 cuts out early at around 2:55.  If you could re-rip the CD that'd be great, mmkay.  Other than those issues it's a great torrent.

sweet up..much thanks
